teacheasy.mediahandler

Class AnswerBoxHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.mediahandler.AnswerBoxHandler

  • public class AnswerBoxHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to draw answer boxes with the specified x & y location
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniel Berhe, Jake Ransom

      • createAnswerBox

        public void createAnswerBox(double xStart,
                   double yStart,
                   int characterLimit,
                   boolean retry,
                   int marks,
                   boolean isNumerical,
                   float upperBound,
                   float lowerBound,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Answer> answers)
        Creates a new answer box object
        Parameters:
        xStart - X coordinate of the object
        yStart - Y coordinate of the object
        characterLimit - Maximum allowed characters
        retry - To allow retry
        marks - Possible marks for a correct answer
        isNumerical - Whether or not numerical input is expected
        upperBound - Upper range of numerical solution
        lowerBound - Lower range of numerical solution
        answers - Solutions to questions
